#!/bin/bash
set -euo pipefail

SOURCE_DIR="${1:-/var/www/html}"
BACKUP_DIR="${2:-/backup/www}"
CHECKSUM_FILE="${3:-backup-checksums.sha256}"

echo "=== Backup Verification ==="
echo "Source: $SOURCE_DIR"
echo "Backup: $BACKUP_DIR"
echo ""

# Generate checksums for source
echo "Generating source checksums..."
cd "$SOURCE_DIR"
find . -type f -exec sha256sum {} \; | sort -k2 > "/tmp/source-checksums.txt"

# Generate checksums for backup
echo "Generating backup checksums..."
cd "$BACKUP_DIR"
find . -type f -exec sha256sum {} \; | sort -k2 > "/tmp/backup-checksums.txt"

# Compare
echo ""
echo "Comparing..."
if diff -q "/tmp/source-checksums.txt" "/tmp/backup-checksums.txt" > /dev/null; then
    echo "‚úì Backup verified: All files match!"
    exit 0
else
    echo "‚úó Backup verification FAILED:"
    echo ""
    diff "/tmp/source-checksums.txt" "/tmp/backup-checksums.txt" | head -20
    exit 1
fi
EOF

#!/bin/bash
set -euo pipefail

WATCH_DIR="${1:-/etc}"
CHECKSUM_FILE="$HOME/.integrity-monitor-$(echo "$WATCH_DIR" | tr / _).sha256"

if [ ! -f "$CHECKSUM_FILE" ]; then
    echo "Creating baseline checksums for $WATCH_DIR..."
    find "$WATCH_DIR" -type f -exec sha256sum {} \; 2>/dev/null | sort -k2 > "$CHECKSUM_FILE"
    echo "Baseline created: $CHECKSUM_FILE"
    exit 0
fi

echo "Checking integrity of $WATCH_DIR..."
echo ""

find "$WATCH_DIR" -type f -exec sha256sum {} \; 2>/dev/null | sort -k2 > "/tmp/current-checksums.txt"

if diff -q "$CHECKSUM_FILE" "/tmp/current-checksums.txt" > /dev/null; then
    echo "‚úì No changes detected"
else
    echo "‚ö†Ô∏è  Changes detected:"
    echo ""
    
    # Show what changed
    diff --unchanged-line-format='' --old-line-format='- %L' --new-line-format='+ %L' \
        "$CHECKSUM_FILE" "/tmp/current-checksums.txt" | head -50
    
    echo ""
    read -p "Update baseline? (y/n) " -n 1 -r
    echo
    if [[ $REPLY =~ ^[Yy]$ ]]; then
        cp "/tmp/current-checksums.txt" "$CHECKSUM_FILE"
        echo "Baseline updated"
    fi
fi
EOF
